text:
Pretty sure someone asked this before when adding a package, I got this from add IJulia, some suggest deleting registries folder but couldn't find it in finder (MacOS)

Any lead? Thanks

Got this:
```ERROR: SystemError: opening file "/Users/mer/.julia/registries/General/Registry.toml": No such file or directory

text:
I don´t know if there is a better way of fixing this, but if you want to remove said folder, you can:
open the terminal (in spotligh type terminal and enter)
do `rm -rf /Users/mer/.julia/registries`
This sounds a bit like brute force to me, though.
